original_title: ゲリラ豪雨で大嫌いなセクハラ上司と二人きりになった夜 JULIA
overview: Julia Is an office Lady who works alongside a despicable boss who she hates with a passion.  One Day she gets told to work overtime by him and they stay late in the office. By the time she is done, She attempts to return home, but a heavy rainstorm suddenly breaks off and she forced to take shelter in the office, with her clothes soaked wet, awkwardly alone with the boss
title: That Night, Due To A Sudden Rainstorm, I Was Trapped With My Boss, Whom I Hated With A Passion JULIA
